name: Telegram-Airdrop-Bot
description: Very simple telegram airdrop bot with Heroku

env__|__description: How many tokens are you going to give? Example: 10000. Do not include ',' must be float number
Date of reward distrubition. Example: 20 July 2021
In which network/chain are you going to give? Example: Binance Smart Chain
The token you get from @BotFather. Example: 1313552295:AAFxDGKhlco-FoWw-uyxInotlKvalidNEz-Q
Extra reward participants will get for each referral. Example: 1000. Do not include ',' must be float number
Bot owner's telegram username. Example: johndoe
Maximum number of participants. Example: 1000. Do not include ',' must be float number
Maximum number of referrals per participant. Example: 5
Enable or disable captcha at start. Example: YES or NO
Twitter page links seperated by comma. Single Example: https://twitter.com/bitcoin. Multiple Example: https://twitter.com/bitcoin,https://twitter.com/ethereum
Twitter page links seperated by comma. Single Example: https://t.me/single. Multiple Example: https://t.me/multi,https://t.me/ple
Discord server links seperated by comma. Single Example: https://discord.gg/example. Multiple Example: https://discord.gg/example,https://discord.gg/ple
Get one from https://cloud.mongodb.com/. Replace <username> and <password>. Example: mongodb+srv://<username>:<password>@cluster0.abcde.mongodb.net/myFirstDatabase?retryWrites=true&w=majority
